info.title: Fecape API
info.description: API for the Fecape (Federação capixaba de pesca e lançamento) web system.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Route for user registration and authentication

tags.name: User
tags.description: Route to list, update and delete users

tags.name: Club
tags.description: Route to list, create, update and delete clubs

tags.name: Athlete
tags.description: Route to list, create, update and delete athletes

tags.name: Championship
tags.description: Route to list, create, update and delete championships

tags.name: Result
tags.description: Route to list, create, update and delete results

requestBody.description: Registering a user in the system

delete.description: Delete an existing user by Id
